gist.headline: It's not you, it's them
gist.blurb: We stopped the gaslighting. Now when upstream providers hit their limits, we tell you it's their fault (502), not yours (429).
gist.summary: Remapped upstream provider rate limits to 502 Bad Gateway to distinguish them from user-specific rate limits.
gist.impact: Clients can now clearly distinguish between their own rate limits and upstream provider capacity issues.
gist.visual_concept: The robot mascot acting as a traffic controller, distinguishing between local traffic and upstream roadblocks. A clear separation of concerns.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the robot mascot sorting glowing data packets into two distinct piles. The bee mascot holds a sign reading '502' with a reassuring smile. Lime green (#ecf874) and soft peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel font text: 'STATUS SORTED'. Emotionally warm.
